title: Task 1

fillInTheBlank.sentence: Hey Sarah, I was _ through the new code changes you made in this _, and I might need some clarification on a specific part.

blanks.feedback: Here it means Brian is reviewing or examining the code changes.
It is a part of the software where Sarah made changes.

dialogue.text: Hey Sarah, I was going through the new code changes you made in this module, and I might need some clarification on a specific part.

description:
In coding, a module is a part of a software program that carries out a specific function. For example, a module in a web application might handle user login.

Go through means to review or examine something carefully. For instance, going through code means checking or reviewing code to understand it better.
